sentences.english: Change good after, lie in the soft pillow and the cotton quilt, feel very comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 換好後，躺在軟綿綿的枕頭與棉被中，覺得很舒服。

sentences.english: Please look at this picture below. Obviously it is a soft leave stone.
sentences.chinese: 請看這張照片，分明是軟綿綿的葉巖來的。

sentences.english: Everything about her was sweet, pale, like honey .
sentences.chinese: 她渾身上下都是甜蜜蜜，軟綿綿的，象蜂蜜那樣。

sentences.english: At noon sharp the sun too soft asphalt road are all the.
sentences.chinese: 中午暴日曬得柏油馬路都軟綿綿的。

sentences.english: The ancestor of the goat family.
sentences.chinese: 軟綿綿是羊族的祖先，創建了羊村。

sentences.english: You take it in your fingers and it lops down over the side of your hand.
sentences.chinese: 你用手指拿着，它便軟綿綿地垂在你手上。

sentences.english: Egg white taste very soft, while carrot and celery are still crunchy . Good mix.
sentences.chinese: 蛋白軟綿綿，和爽口的甘筍西芹很夾。

sentences.english: As the smell wafted up, I climbed out from under my mosquito net and walked softly out of my room.
sentences.chinese: 我從蚊帳裏探身出來，渾身軟綿綿的走出房間。

definition: variant of 熱乎乎|热乎乎[re4 hu1 hu1]
first-rate/excellent (loanword from Japanese 一番, ichiban)
to leap and frisk about (idiom); lively/healthy and active
to press down/to crush down/to restrain (anger)/to keep down (voice)
to have a close call/to have a narrow escape
in a low voice/(speak) in whispers
